EmailTemplate.name: CS Customer - Contract Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Community Solar contract has been received!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Opportunity.Name}, Your Community Solar contract has been received.
You will receive your fully executed copy of the agreement from DocuSign shortly.
If you do not receive the fully executed contract in your email, or if you have any other questions, please contact us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com.
Thanks for joining us to make ‘Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality. -All of us here at BlueWave P.S. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or (844) 786 - 4100. We’re happy to help.
